name: Tales of the Magic Ball: The Lost Sorcerer
name_original: Tales of the Magic Ball: The Lost Sorcerer
description:
You, the magic ball, have lost your sorcerer and in order not to perish you must find him again. For this reason, you start your journey. Initially, you'll find yourself in a magical, dreamy world that matches the ball. During your journey, however, your real adventure begins. You'll learn about the ball's morally questionable origin, discover the lost writings that reveal the worlds' past, and live through a story that becomes increasingly dark as you travel through gloomy worlds.

Tales of the Magic Ball is a puzzle platformer where you'll experience a fantastic story during your adventure in a magical world. Use your magic to solve puzzles. Use magic to defeat your enemies. Interact with the inhabitants and get help. Face the challenges and try to survive. Let the world enchant you.

-Play with a physically simulated ball and solve difficult bouncing passages.


-Let the puzzles challenge you.


-Use your magic to defeat your enemies and solve puzzles.


-Fight your opponent and adjust your tactics.


-Enjoy the story.

-Explore hand-built levels.


Wildmonkeygames is a small 1-man-team with a few freelancers who, besides their regular work, have dedicated themselves to game development with a lot of love and passion. Originally "Tales of the Magic Ball" was planned as a fast skill game/roller ball, but in the course of development more and more a more modern kind of roller ball crystallized out, meanwhile it became an adventure platformer, in which you can experience a story. The whole thing is spiced with puzzle game elements and packed in a beautiful fantasy world.
I hope you will enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed developing it.
